mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Whitechapel Gallery is a public art gallery on the north side of Whitechapel High Street in London; it was founded in 1901 as one of the first publicly funded galleries for temporary exhibitions in London. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Whitechapel_Gallery [work]
